\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{xstring}

\IfStrEq*{\jobname}{job-1}
  {\usepackage{minted}}
  {\usepackage[outputdir=output]{minted}}

\begin{document}
\section{Scheme Sample - The Euclidean Algorithm}
\begin{minted}{scheme}
(define (gcd a b)
  (if (zero? b)
    a
    (gcd b (modulo a b))))
\end{minted}
\end{document}
